inlinecomments-desc: Allow adding comments to a page
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-title: Title of page to add comment to.
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-contain: Name of element that is the common ancestor of selected text.
inlinecomments-missingpage: Could not edit comments as page does not exist.
inlinecomments-noitembyid: Cannot mark comment as resolved as it does not exist.
inlinecomments-addcomment-noitembyid: Cannot reply to comment as it does not exist.
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-pageid: Page id to add comment to. Use either this or title parameter but not both
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-ti: Title of page to add reply to. Use this or pageid but not both
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-pa: page id of page to add reply to. Use this or pageid but not both
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-id: id number of the comment you are replying to
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-summary: Add a reply to an inline comment
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-summary: Mark an inline comment resolved and remove from page
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-tit: Title of page to resolve comment on. Use this or pageid but not both
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-pag: page id of page to resolve comment on. Use this or pageid but not both
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-id: id number of the comment you are resolving
